derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Old French tunique or Latin tunica

entry.def: A tunic is a sleeveless garment that is worn on the top part of your body.

means.word_mean: 1. an enveloping or covering membrane or layer of body tissue
2. any of a variety of loose fitting cloaks extending to the hips or knees
